import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu-vertical', templateUrl: './menu-vertical.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu-vertical.component.scss'] }) export class MenuVerticalComponent { isVisible: boolean = false; ngOnInit(): void { this.isVisible = false; } public menuShow(){ this.isVisible = !this.isVisible; } }
